summary: This document consists of email correspondence primarily involving Jeffrey Epstein and several other individuals discussing the FTC v. Bear Stearns case. The emails indicate ongoing settlement discussions and the need for confidentiality regarding the communications. The document highlights the involvement of legal counsel and the importance of maintaining privileged information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

persons.context: Indyke forwards information to Epstein regarding the FTC case.

events.title: FTC v. Bear Stearns Settlement Discussions
